attributes.action: consider instructing The Treasury to zero rate for vat purposes, fully compostable alternatives to the plastic carrier bag for a period of one year commencing 1st January 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plastic bags will kill and maime our wildlife and pollute our environment for generations to come. We suggest that for bags to attract a zero vat rate they must comply with, or exceed the ASTM D6400-99 standard for compostable plastic bags and contain no polyethylene.
